subject: Football (College)
Heisman Trophy
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: The 81 coaches and players up for election to the College Football Hall of Fame include the Heisman Trophy winners Rashaan Salaam of Colorado, Ricky Williams of Texas and Eric Crouch of Nebraska.
snippet: The 81 coaches and players up for election to the College Football Hall of Fame include the Heisman Trophy winners Rashaan Salaam of Colorado, Ricky Williams of Texas and Eric Crouch of Nebraska.
